name: Music Factory
description:
• Shooting Lasers to the beat of the music!
    can you keep up to the beat and destroy
    every node in the song or will you run out of
    power trying?
  • A rhythm game made in a very small package!    
    This game was made for the Low-Rez game jam
    That means this game can be played in it's original 
    64x64 pixel size.

----------------------------------------

Song Line up

  • Albion/The Pack
    by Yeeflex
  • Cryogenics
    by Novas Canvas
  • Sunburn
    by The Living Tombstone
  • Take Me Home Tonight
    by Phlex

-----------------------------------------

A new song will be added next month some new options and, a better looking desktop icon.

Share this game!
This will help me get more songs for the line up in the future!
